entry.title: BIP352: PSBT support
entry.summary: The updated draft for the Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) has undergone significant modifications, as detailed in the latest version available at [this link](https://gist.github.com/andrewtoth/dc26f683010cd53aca8e477504c49260). A noteworthy change is the elimination of the OutputGenerator role from the proposal. This modification aligns with a shift towards employing the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) share technique, a method highlighted by @josibake. The adoption of the ECDH share technique enhances the security and efficiency of the proposed improvements.
